com.microsoft.band.personalization

Interface BandPersonalizationManager


  • public interface BandPersonalizationManager
    Manager for personalizing a Microsoft Band through Microsoft Health's band communication service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BandPendingResult<android.graphics.Bitmap> getMeTileImage()
      Method to get the Me Tile image of the Microsoft Band
      BandPendingResult<BandTheme> getTheme()
      Method to get the theme of the Microsoft Band
      BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> setMeTileImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
      Method to set the Me Tile image of the Microsoft Band
      BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> setTheme(BandTheme theme)
      Method to set the theme of the Microsoft Band

    • Method Detail

      • getMeTileImage

        BandPendingResult<android.graphics.Bitmap> getMeTileImage()
                                                          throws BandIOException
        Method to get the Me Tile image of the Microsoft Band
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Bitmap return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if service is not available; no MeTile image on the device

      • getTheme

        BandPendingResult<BandTheme> getTheme()
                                      throws BandIOException
        Method to get the theme of the Microsoft Band
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a BandTheme return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available

      • setMeTileImage

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> setMeTileImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image)
                                                 throws BandIOException
        Method to set the Me Tile image of the Microsoft Band
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap; if null will clear the current Me Tile Image from the Microsoft Band
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Void return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given Bitmap's configuration is not Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888 or the dimensions of the bitmap are not 310 X 102 pixels for V1 bands or 310 X 128 pixels for V2 bands.

      • setTheme

        BandPendingResult<java.lang.Void> setTheme(BandTheme theme)
                                           throws BandIOException
        Method to set the theme of the Microsoft Band
        Parameters:
        theme - BandTheme; if null will reset the Microsoft Band to its default theme
        Returns:
        A BandPendingResult with a Void return value that could potentially throw a BandException with the following error types: BandErrorType.DEVICE_ERROR and BandErrorType.TIMEOUT_ERROR
        Throws:
        BandIOException - if Microsoft Health's band communication service is not available
